original_solution_mapping.L1: Since, three years from now, Tabitha will have 8 different colors in her hair, this year she has 8 - 3 = <<8-3=5>>5 colors in her hair.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Since she had 2 colors in her hair at the age of 15, she has added 5-2=3 colors since she was 15 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Since she ads one color per year, 3 added colors = <<3=3>>3 added years
original_solution_mapping.L4: Thus, currently, she is 15+3=<<15+3=18>>18 years old.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4998.
    Returns: Tabitha's current age.
    """
    # L1
    colors_in_future = 8 # 8 different colors in her hair
    years_from_now = 3 # In three years
    current_colors = colors_in_future - years_from_now

    # L2
    colors_at_15 = 2 # 2 colors in her hair
    age_at_2_colors = 15 # 15 years old
    colors_added_since_15 = current_colors - colors_at_15

    # L3
    years_added = colors_added_since_15

    # L4
    current_age = age_at_2_colors + years_added

    # FA
    answer = current_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Since, three years from now, Tabitha will have {colors_in_future} different colors in her hair, this year she has {colors_in_future} - {years_from_now} = <<{colors_in_future}-{years_from_now}={current_colors}>>{current_colors} colors in her hair.

Since she had {colors_at_15} colors in her hair at the age of {age_at_2_colors}, she has added {current_colors}-{colors_at_15}={colors_added_since_15} colors since she was {age_at_2_colors} years old.
Since she ads one color per year, {colors_added_since_15} added colors = <<{colors_added_since_15}={years_added}>>{years_added} added years
Thus, currently, she is {age_at_2_colors}+{years_added}=<<{age_at_2_colors}+{years_added}={current_age}>>{current_age} years old.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Since, three years from now, Tabitha will have 8 different colors in her hair, this year she has 8 - 3 = <<8-3=5>>5 colors in her hair.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Since she had 2 colors in her hair at the age of 15, she has added 5-2=3 colors since she was 15 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Since she ads one color per year, 3 added colors = <<3=3>>3 added years
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Thus, currently, she is 15+5=<<15+5=20>>20 years old.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'current_colors' (value: 5) was used instead of 'years_added' (value: 3).
